tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.Yellow>Thank you for joining this server! You can join our discord by clicking the Discord button below!



SETTINGS:


- Harvest: x25

- Taming: x100

- Tribe Limit: 4 man

- Collision: Disabled

- Custom Drops

- Custom Craft

- Bushberry System for Bosses

- Active Staffs

- Ingame Shop</>

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.Yellow>❌ - Do not build on  KO/Bed and similar ratholes

❌ - Building to restrict usage of drops or resource areas like Ice Cave + UnderWater Caves (Pearls Caves Are Allowed)

❌ - Meshing, Exploiting, Tunneling, Duping is NOT allowed

❌ - OB Building is NOT allowed (Blue Ob Allowed)

❌ - Caging is allowed only 3H

❌ - Dinos with platforms must be able to get shot from atleast one side

❌ - Mesh Bitting is NOT allowed</>
